item.title: Commits & Pull Requests
item.description: Commits & Pull Requests conventions Commits In the past, we used to have only one commit by pull request. This was a bad habit. We now require contributors to make atomic commits, so you will surely have more than one commit in a single pull request. This will be helpful to review, cherry-pick or revert (we hope to never have to do that ðŸ˜‰) the changes. What’s an atomic commit?
